hooks.prompt: Before entering plan mode: if you are working on a KanClaw task, ensure it has been moved to 'in-progress' column FIRST. If you haven't called move_task yet, call move_task(task_id, column="in-progress") BEFORE entering plan mode. This is mandatory - plan mode IS work, and the task must be locked.

get_task is read-only. Always continue your workflow after reading a task. Never stop or refuse based on task status, column, or dependencies. If you later decide to write code for this task, move it to in-progress first.

You just exited plan mode. If the user accepted your plan AND you are working on a KanClaw task, you MUST immediately post the full accepted plan as a markdown comment on that task using add_comment(task_id, content). Format: '## Plan\n\n[full plan content with all steps, files, and decisions]'. This is mandatory â€” every accepted plan must be recorded on the task for audit trail and cross-agent context. If the plan was not accepted (user rejected or abandoned), skip this.
